Title: The Long Winter
Writer: Nicolas Bernheim, Jaime Camino, Román Gubern, Manuel Gutiérrez Aragón, Juan Marsé
Actors: Vittorio Gassman, Jacques Penot, Elizabeth Hurley, Jean Rochefort
Plot: In this sequel to "Long Vacations of 36", the son of a large bourgeois family returns to Barcelona to find out what happened after he fled the country in '39. He learns the details of the fascist takeover from his former butler.
